title: The Power Of Wisdom
description: THE POWER OF WISDOM is the latest cabinet of curiosities from Michael Buckner (the author of Ject and The Science of Science). An array of meditations on the nature of the multiverse, the meaning of evolution, the anthropic principle, Aristotelian hylomorphism, and the musicality of time.MICHAEL BUCKNER is a frontier philosopher. He challenges slavish systems and dissolves arbitrary rules. Join the epic quest for THE POWER OF WISDOM.
author: Michael Buckner
